metadata.name: Omnispark Crystal
metadata.description:
The Omnispark Crystal is a stunning piece of art and design, crafted to evoke the power of the universe. The Santa Rosa Tourmaline crystal at its center shines with a blue-green gradient and a green tip, a bicolor Indicolite that captures the essence of the natural world. The intricate silver primordial symbols by @DawnJaiye that cover its surface give it a touch of the ancient and the modern, symbolizing the timeless interplay between tradition and innovation. Effortlessly suspended in space, the Omnispark Crystal seems to defy gravity itself, its aura of energy pulsing and beckoning to all who gaze upon it. This incredible crystal is a true representation of the Omnispark, a fusion of energy, spirit, and beauty that will leave you awestruck.

Omnispark Crystal is redeemable for a physical t-shirt and discounts on all Omnispark merchandise!
